Name: Spawn Barrels
ExecutionCode:
for i=1,10 do
    local ent = ents.Create("prop_physics")
    ent:SetModel("models/props_c17/oildrum001_explosive.mdl")
    local ply = player.GetAll()[1]
    if IsValid(ply) then
        ent:SetPos(ply:GetPos() + Vector(0, 0, 100) + VectorRand() * 200)
    end
    ent:Spawn()
end
UndoCode:
for k,v in pairs(ents.FindByClass("prop_physics")) do
    if v:GetModel() == "models/props_c17/oildrum001_explosive.mdl" then
        v:Remove()
    end
end
